DataSourcePortable.Name: Saldo do documento
DataSourcePortable.Content:
<DataSourceDefinition> <FromSql Alias="A" SelectCommand="SELECT A.HANDLE,
 B.DOCUMENTO,
 A.VALORNOMINAL,
 SUM(CASE
 WHEN (B.VALOR - B.VALORESBAIXADOS) IS NULL THEN 0
 ELSE (B.VALOR - B.VALORESBAIXADOS) END) SALDO,
 CASE
 WHEN SUM(B.VALOR - B.VALORESBAIXADOS) IS NULL THEN 'LIQUIDADO'
 ELSE 'VALOR LÃQUIDO'
 END VALORLABEL
 FROM FN_DOCUMENTOS A
 LEFT JOIN FN_PARCELAS B ON A.HANDLE = B.DOCUMENTO
 GROUP BY A.HANDLE,
 B.DOCUMENTO,
 A.VALORNOMINAL,
 A.ABRANGENCIA,
 A.ENTRADASAIDA" /> <Fields> <Field Alias="HANDLE" From="A" Path="HANDLE" /> <Field Alias="DOCUMENTO" From="A" Path="DOCUMENTO" /> <DecimalField Alias="VALORNOMINAL" From="A" Path="VALORNOMINAL" FieldDecimalsFormat="0" /> <DecimalField Alias="SALDO" From="A" Path="SALDO" FieldDecimalsFormat="0" /> <Field Alias="VALORLABEL" From="A" Path="VALORLABEL" /> </Fields> </DataSourceDefinition>
